title: The Law Cafe
overview: A work that deals with the story of a former prosecutor-turned-building owner who used to be called a monstrous genius and a former Miss Korea turned lawyer, surrounding the law office and 'law café'.Adapted from the web novel "Love According to Law" (법대로 사랑하라) written by No Seung Ah (노승아) and illustrated by Il Ri (일리).
